title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Boeing 247D - using the trim systems
description:
In this video we are going to have a look at the trim systems of the Boeing 247D. The aircraft has 3 trim systems in total which will allow you to make different corrections. We will start at the ground to see what the effect is of using the trim buttons and will go airborne after that to see how you can use them during your flight.
